title: Shadow Banking and Systemic Risk Regulation
content: For release on delivery  12:15 p.m. EST  November 22, 2013         Shadow Banking and Systemic Risk Regulation    Remarks by   Daniel K. Tarullo    Member   Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System    at the    Americans for Financial Reform and Economic Policy Institute Conference    Washington, D.C.        November 22, 2013
